title: Anushka Sharma Talks About An Artists’ Responsibility To Be Non-Judgemental, And It's Something All Of Us Need To Read!
text:
facebook 502 SHARES 
Meryl Streep's recent acceptance speech at the Golden Globes Awards has made us think about the social responsibility that all of us carry, specifically artists who have a strong voice and reach. After watching the speech, many questioned why Bollywood actors and filmmakers shy away from putting forth relevant opinions ans thoughts, and using their position and fame to challenge the way people think. 
Anushka Sharma wrote a message for all her fans, which does make us think about how we need to approach the world. Drawing from the speech, she says. "In order to 'enter the lives of people who are different from us, and let you feel what that feels like,' they (actors) have to have the absolute freedom from judgement." 
We would say that everyone needs to be free of judgement, and be able to understand that their truth is not the only truth.
